title: Drawing, "Desk", February 26, 1934
medium: Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 9006 DESK/F.S./SLOANE/STRAIGHT GRAIN/& WOOD/BURL, Olsson/ 2/26/34, 3/1/34, 1, WIDDICOMB [crossed out]/8/23/35, 1, SLOANE; dimensions, instructions, materials in graphite
description: Perspective, plan and elevation drawings for desk. Top of desk and interior in straight grain wood; drawers at left and right and outer surface in burl wood. Three square, stacked drawers at left and right; space in middle open. Rectangular pulls on drawers with rounded edges. Left and right edges rounded.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desk", February 26, 1934.
February 26, 1934. Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-913.
